Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard

Class PersonalBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.personalBoard.PersonalBoard
public class PersonalBoard
extends java.lang.Object
Personal Board is a class that contains all the part that compose the player's board.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PersonalBoard​(java.lang.String username, FaithTrack faithTrack, ResourceManager resourceManager, CardManager cardManager)
    Construct a Personal Board of a specific player.
